title: IAA Tonight | Mac Jones Remains the Starter AND Do the Chicago Bears Need New Ownership?
description: The Philadelphia Eagles traded for veteran pass-rusher Robert Quinn from the Chicago Bears Wednesday for a fourth-round pick. The trade had Quinn's now former teammate Roquan Smith fighting back tears at his press conference. Are the Bears in need of a revamp at the ownership level? Former Bears WR Brandon Marshall, LeSean McCoy, and Leger Douzable discuss that and Mac Jones remaining as the starter in New England.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, LeSean Mccoy, Brandon MArshall)
